name: Beautiful World
description: This is a demo version of my game.  The game features five types of enemies, two campaigns (mage and warrior), and a boss that is not easy to defeat. Next, you can learn about the game from me or in the game itself.I plan to create a large-scale game, but I don't have a team or money for it. If you like the game, then Fund its creation as much as you can. Now I want to raise $ 2,500.If I collect this amount, I will start creating the full version of the game. Also, if you notice any errors, please report them so that I can fix them.Thank you in advance)
